name: DeleteDeployment
description:
Delete a Vercel deployment using its ID or URL.

Use this tool to delete a Vercel deployment by providing the deployment's `id` or `url`. Useful for managing and cleaning up deployments.

parameters.name: deployment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the deployment to be deleted. Use this if not providing a URL.

value_schema.description: The ID of the deployment to be deleted

parameters.name: deployment_url
parameters.description: A Deployment or Alias URL for identifying the deployment to delete. The ID will be ignored if this is provided.

value_schema.description: A Deployment or Alias URL. In case it is passed, the ID will be ignored

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team on whose behalf the request is executed.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the deletion on behalf of. Specify which team's deployment to delete.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: A Deployment or Alias URL. In case it is passed, the ID will be ignored

value_schema.description: A Deployment or Alias URL. In case it is passed, the ID will be ignored

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the deployment to be deleted

value_schema.description: The ID of the deployment to be deleted
